attributes.action: change the adult mental health law
attributes.additional_details: Mental illness kill's because the system fails young adults of 18+ especially those who cannot make decisions for them selves over there own health, let the parents have more powers to make decisions for them and keep them alive!!! we need the law changing NOW so as to allow the parents to interact more with the GP or Health Advisers on what would be best for them, at 18+ the parent has no power to decide these things for them which lead's to many deaths change the law NOW!
